meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>deep</kanji> <kanji>carve</kanji> is very <vocabulary>serious</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>grave</vocabulary>. Just imagine getting cut with a sword. If the carve is deep, well, that's serious.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
